## foundationGridPro variable

A function that returns a Foundation Grid Pro registration for configuring the component with a DesignSystem.

**Signature:**

```typescript
foundationGridPro: (overrideDefinition?: import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").OverrideFoundationElementDefinition<{
    shadowOptions: any;
    baseName: string;
    styles: import("@microsoft/fast-element").ElementStyles;
    template: import("@microsoft/fast-element").ViewTemplate<any, any>;
}>) => import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").FoundationElementRegistry<{
    shadowOptions: any;
    baseName: string;
    styles: import("@microsoft/fast-element").ElementStyles;
    template: import("@microsoft/fast-element").ViewTemplate<any, any>;
}, typeof GridPro>
```
